snippet: St. Louis, who appeared to hurt his right leg in Sunday’s win, joined goalie Henrik Lundqvist and defenseman Kevin Klein on the sidelines for the first-place Rangers.
abstract: New York Rangers announce that forward Martin St Louis will miss 10 to 14 days due to lower-body injury; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis, who appeared to hurt his right leg in Sunday’s win, joined goalie Henrik Lundqvist and defenseman Kevin Klein on the sidelines for the first-place Rangers.

headline.main: Rangers’ Martin St. Louis Is Expected to Miss 10 to 14 Days
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Rangers’ St. Louis Sidelined
